structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Certain Writs And Proceedings In Special Cases
Improvement Of Low Land And Swamps

law.catch_line: Board; Power To Employ Engineers, Etc.; Expenses
law.text: In carrying out the provisions of this chapter, the board may employ necessary engineers, assistants, or other agents, who may enter on land which the board desires to survey or examine. The board shall also be allowed other necessary expenses incurred in the performance of its duties.
